Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 He landed on top of a large mountain. The cold wing blowing at 30= miles. 
The cold was welcomeing. He stared at the sun with his eyes closed. He spoke 
with a stern yet staggering voice unusal for him. "This war is just one of 
many I have fought. Each one I have fought in I have lost due to that Prime. 
If I lose this time...then I know that there is no hope for a destron victory 
against the maximals or predacons ever again. Our time is know. We must make 
a stron legion. We must train and we must fight. One by one these seperate 
groups will become part of us." out of his hand showed a  needle. "Whoever is 
injected with this no matter what bot wil be reprogrammed into destron. It 
doesnt attack the  spark but the mind. It immediatly reconfigures the nueral 
net to destron. Megatron you and LIke Like alone I also trust with these 
needles. Magamtron may not approve. But if we are to suceed we must make more 
men. Are you in?"

--part1_d4.22a57ec.27b60e18_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
